outputs.output_descr: The Directorate Management Project focuses on supporting the initiatives of the clusters within BERA following the External Relations and Advocacy Framework (ERAF).
Management Project of the Office of Communication
This project focuses on the staff related costs of the Bureau for External Relations and Advocacy (BERA).
